SEARCH

Class DogManager

java.lang.Object
DogManager
public class DogManager extends Object
DogManager class: stores all dogs and provides core system features. This class lets us add, find, update, remove, and report on dog records.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<Dog>
    dogsCheckedIn
    This holds the dogs that are currently checked in.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DogManager()
    Constructor: starts with an empty list of all dogs and dogs checked in.

  • Field Details

    • dogsCheckedIn

      public ArrayList<Dog> dogsCheckedIn
      This holds the dogs that are currently checked in.

  • Constructor Details

    • DogManager

      public DogManager()
      Constructor: starts with an empty list of all dogs and dogs checked in. We always use the same DogManager throughout the program.

  • Method Details

    • addDog

      public boolean addDog(Dog dog, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Adds a new dog record if the ID doesn't exist yet.
      Parameters:
      dog - This is a dog object, containing all the dog's attributes.
      conn - This is the active database connection.
      Returns:
      True if the dog is added, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exceptions are handled by returning false.

    • getDogs

      public List<Dog> getDogs(Boolean checkedIn, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Get dogs from the database based on the checked in status passed in as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      checkedIn - If true, return only checked in dogs, otherwise all dogs.
      conn - This is the active database connection.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of dog objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exceptions are handled by returning null.

    • removeDog

      public Dog removeDog(int id, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Removes a dog by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the dog to be removed.
      conn - This is the active database connection.
      Returns:
      Returns a dog object for the removed dog, or null if the dog was not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exceptions are handled by returning null.

    • updateDog

      public boolean updateDog(int id, Dog updatedDog, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Updates the entire dog record for a specific ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the dog to be updated.
      updatedDog - An object of type Dog of the dog to be updated.
      conn - This is the active database connection.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the dog is updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exceptions are handled by returning false.

    • findDogById

      public Dog findDogById(int id, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Finds a dog by a specific ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the dog to be selected from the database.
      conn - This is the active database connection.
      Returns:
      Returns the Dog object if found, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exceptions are handled by returning null.

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile(String filename, Connection conn) throws IOException, SQLException
      Loads dog records from a comma-separated text file. Each line should have: id,name,breed,dob,food,gender,spayedNeutered,checkedIn Adds only new records (no duplicates). Skips malformed lines.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file containing dog data.
      conn - This is the active database connection.
      Throws:
      IOException - Errors in file are skipped.
      SQLException - Handled in "addDog" method.

    • generateAttendanceReport

      public String generateAttendanceReport(Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Custom action: creates a report of checked-in dogs, food types needed, and each checked-in dog's info in detail.
      Parameters:
      conn - This is the active database connection.
      Returns:
      Returns a formatted String of the attendance report.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Handled in "getDogs" method.

    • isValidDob

      public static boolean isValidDob(String dob)
      Validates that the dog's birth date is in YYYY-MM-DD format and not in the future.
      Parameters:
      dob - A string in the format of "YYYY-MM-DD".
      Returns:
      Returns true if the date is valid and not in the future, otherwise false.

    • isValidGender

      public static boolean isValidGender(String gender)
      Checks if gender is valid ("M" or "F").
      Parameters:
      gender - A string in the format of "M" or "F".
      Returns:
      Returns true if valid, otherwise false.

    • isValidSpayedNeutered

      public static boolean isValidSpayedNeutered(String sn)
      Checks if spayedNeutered field is valid ("U", "Y", or "N").
      Parameters:
      sn - A string in the format of "U", "Y", or "N".
      Returns:
      Returns true if valid, otherwise false.
